sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{fontFile.MainMenu}}
</template>

<script>
import bus from '@/util/Bus'
export default {
  name: "Main_menu",
  data(){
    return{
      fontFile:require('@/json/en-US_font.json')
    }
  },
  created() {
    console.log('4')
  },
  mounted() {

    console.log(this.fontFile)
  },
  updated() {
    bus.on("getFontFile",(val)=>{
      console.log('3')
      this.fontFile = val
    })
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
@import "../../less/main";

</style>
